title: Whisky chanterelles over mushroom risotto
ingredients: ['55g dried mushrooms', '1L boiling water, divided', '2 knobs butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '500g chanterelle mushrooms, cleaned and torn onto large pieces', '1 onion, chopped', 'a peaty whisky (I used a 16 year old single malt Lagavulin, may I be forgiven)', '1 knob butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '360g risotto rice', 'salt and black pepper to taste']
